brief_title: A Study of TQB3616 Capsules Combined With Fulvestrant Injection in Subjects With Advanced Breast Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
inclusion criteria: 

 1.Understood and signed an informed consent form. 2.Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0 to 1; Life expectancy ≥ 3 months. 3. Histopathologically confirmed HR positive and HER2 negative advanced or metastatic breast cancer. 4.Cohort 1: patients had received ≤1 line of treatment. 5.Cohort 2: patients had not previously received systemic antitumor therapy. 6.Has at least one measurable lesion according to RECIST1.1 criteria. 7.Adequate laboratory indicators.
brief_summary: This study is a multicenter, open-label, multi-cohort phase II clinical trials to evaluate the efficacy and safety of TQB3616 capsules combined with Fulvestrant injection in subjects with HR-positive and HER2-negative advanced and/or metastatic breast cancer, including Cohort 1 and Cohort 2. Each cohort will enroll 30-60 cases.
